scripts.dev: set -a; [ -f .env ] && . .env; set +a; NODE_ENV=development CREAM_ENV=${CREAM_ENV:-PAPER} turbo run dev
scripts.test: set -a; [ -f .env ] && . .env; set +a; NODE_ENV=test CREAM_ENV=PAPER turbo run test --filter='!./apps/dashboard'
scripts.test:ts: set -a; [ -f .env ] && . .env; set +a; NODE_ENV=test CREAM_ENV=PAPER turbo run test --filter='!./apps/dashboard' --filter='!@cream/execution-engine' --filter='!@cream/alpaca-stream-proxy'
scripts.test:rs: set -a; [ -f .env ] && . .env; set +a; CREAM_ENV=PAPER turbo run test --filter=@cream/execution-engine --filter=@cream/alpaca-stream-proxy
scripts.test:e2e: set -a; [ -f .env ] && . .env; set +a; CREAM_ENV=PAPER bun test ./**/tests/integration/*.test.ts --timeout 120000 && cd apps/dashboard && bun run test:e2e
scripts.lint: turbo run lint && bun run lint:deps
